response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is a rare chance to secure such a valuable asset at a premium yet favorable rate. I look forward to discussing the details further and understanding how this product can enhance your needs and aspirations. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
